title: v2 Campaign, Network and Reporting Period

formulas.txt:
concat(select((array("Today","Yesterday","Last 7 Days","Last 30 Days","This Month","This Year","Last 365 Days")),((array("TODAY","YESTERDAY","LAST_7_DAYS","LAST_30_DAYS","THIS_MONTH","This Year","Last 365 Days"))=$AWKSPeriod))," (",switch($AWKSPeriod,"TODAY",datevalue(today(),"MMM dd, yyyy"),"YESTERDAY",datevalue(yesterday(),"MMM dd, yyyy"),"LAST_7_DAYS",concat(datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-7"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(yesterday(),"MMM dd, yyyy")),"LAST_30_DAYS",concat(datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-30"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(yesterday(),"MMM dd, yyyy")),"THIS_MONTH",concat(datevalue(date_startof(today(),"3"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(today(),"MMM dd, yyyy")),"This Year",concat(datevalue(date_startof(today(),"1"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(today(),"MMM dd, yyyy")),"Last 365 Days",concat(datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-365"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(yesterday(),"MMM dd, yyyy"))),")","
vs. previous period (",switch($AWKSPeriod,"TODAY",datevalue(yesterday(),"MMM dd, yyyy"),"YESTERDAY",datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-2"),"MMM dd, yyyy"),"LAST_7_DAYS",concat(datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-14"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-8"),"MMM dd, yyyy")),"LAST_30_DAYS",concat(datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-60"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-31"),"MMM dd, yyyy")),"THIS_MONTH",concat(datevalue(date_startof(today(),"3","-1"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(date_add(today(),"3","-1"),"MMM dd, yyyy")),"This Year",concat(datevalue(date_startof(today(),"1","-1"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(date_add(today(),"1","-1"),"MMM dd, yyyy")),"Last 365 Days",concat(datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-730"),"MMM dd, yyyy")," - ",datevalue(date_add(today(),"5","-366"),"MMM dd, yyyy"))),")")

data:
